name: header
label: Header
default: Putting the office of the  future to work today.

name: richtext_field
label: Rich text
default: Hub & spoke offers a centralized hub or HQ for important meetings and a network of smaller office spaces, referred to as “spokes,” for greater workplace flexibility. It’s more than a new way to think about space. It’s a reset button that will transform your workplace and inspire your workers.

children.name: step_description
children.label: Step Description
children.default: The short answer is: They’re everywhere. The first step in creating an effective hub & spoke strategy is to assess your employee geography, so you can create a network of on-demand or dedicated space that allows for privacy when you want it and collaboration and team-building when you need it.

default.step_description: The short answer is: They’re everywhere. The first step in creating an effective hub & spoke strategy is to assess your employee geography, so you can create a network of on-demand or dedicated space that allows for privacy when you want it and collaboration and team-building when you need it.
